#Introduction
There are two functions in this package. Running function "Stock_simple_return()", you can get a simple stock return of lastest date. Running function "Stock_plot_return", you can get the plot of the open, the close and the adjusted price of the stock you enterThe function runs slowly. Please wait with a bit patience.

#Installation
```{R}
require(dseprojectS)
```

#Usage
Data comes from yahoo, please enter the symbol of the stock. The following is an example.
```{R}
stock_simple_return(FB)
stock_plot_return(FB)
```
